T02D2494:249a-1: ga na tsakra bi dhi tsinta ma ni n'a ma /
T02D2494:249a-3: chags kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba /
T02D2494:249a-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2494:249a-5: mchog dang thun mong kun gyi gzhi //
T02D2494:249a-6: lam dang dngos grub mthar phyin pa //
T02D2494:249a-7: rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02D2494:249a-8: de 'dir bsdus te brjod par bya //
T02D2494:249a-9: dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon sel cing //
T02D2494:249a-10: mi mthun phyogs rnams 'joms byed pa //
T02D2494:249a-11: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa nyid //
T02D2494:249a-12: lhag pa'i lha yang tshim par 'gyur //
T02D2494:249a-13: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni //
T02D2494:249a-14: myur du lung bstan thob par byed //
T02D2494:249a-15: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yi //
T02D2494:249a-17: ji ltar yang dag sbyor ba las //
T02D2494:249a-18: rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon //
T02D2494:249a-19: 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed cing //
T02D2494:249a-20: dge ba'i tshogs la 'dud pa gang //
T02D2494:249a-21: zos pas dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid //
T02D2494:249a-22: de bzhin rdo rje phreng ba las //
T02D2494:249a-23: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
T02D2494:249a-25: gang zhig mchod pa bzhin du spyad //
T02D2494:249a-26: rang gzhan dngos grub nye ba nyid //
T02D2494:249a-27: 'dir ni mgron dang dus dang ni //
T02D2494:249a-28: gnas dang rdzas dang bya ba'o //
T02D2494:249a-29: mchog tu gyur pa'i cho ga 'dis //
T02D2494:249a-30: gang zhig dngos grub mngon du 'gyur //
T02D2494:249a-31: de la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sgra //
T02D2494:249a-32: don ni dgos pa'i sgo nas te //
T02D2494:249a-33: mgron gyi rang bzhin bshad par bya //
T02D2494:249a-34: dpal ldan rdo rje phreng ba las //
T02D2494:249a-36: mnyam zhing gcig tu gyur byas nas //
T02D2494:249a-37: brda dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba shes //
T02D2494:249a-39: de la mang du 'dus pa'i tshogs //
T02D2494:249a-40: 'khor lo lha yi rim pa nyid //
T02D2494:249a-41: thun mong dus su bshad pa nyid //
T02D2494:249a-43: thams cad du ni dam tshig gcig / rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs //
T02D2494:249a-44: bla ma la gus ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2494:249a-45: sbyin sogs yon tan rgyan spras pa'i //
T02D2494:249a-47: bgegs med par ni rab tu 'jug / gzhan du skyon dang bcas par 'gyur //
T02D2494:249a-48: thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du //
T02D2494:249a-49: yid 'phrog bya dang bya min mkhas //
T02D2494:249a-50: lo ni nyi shu lnga lon las//
T02D2494:249b-0: @249b lhag pa yongs su spang bar bya //
T02D2494:249b-1: yongs shes thabs ni thams cad la //
T02D2494:249b-2: shes rab gcig gis bya ba min //
T02D2494:249b-3: 'dir ni sgrub pa gcig pa yi //
T02D2494:249b-4: bla mas slob ma rjes su gzung //
T02D2494:249b-5: ji skad sdom pa 'byung ba las //
T02D2494:249b-7: slob dpon sngon du phyogs byas nas //
T02D2494:249b-8: slob dpon yon tan ma bsdams na //
T02D2494:249b-10: slob dpon med par 'gyur pa na //
T02D2494:249b-11: gzhan yang bla ma mtshan nyid ldan //
T02D2494:249b-12: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug byas pa nyid //
T02D2494:249b-13: gus pa gcig pa'i tshul gyis spyad //
T02D2494:249b-14: de yang rdo rje phreng ba las//
T02D2494:249b-15: zhi la sogs pa'i phrin las dang //
T02D2494:249b-16: sngags kyi sbyor ba'i cho ga shes //
T02D2494:249b-17: bya ba nyi shu'i dbye bas ni //
T02D2494:249b-18: bla ma'i cho ga bya ba ni //
T02D2494:249b-19: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang //
T02D2494:249b-21: nyin mtshan rtag pa dge la spro //
T02D2494:249b-22: shes rab rno zhing bzo gnas mkhas //
T02D2494:249b-23: gnyis med yon tan gyis lci ba //
T02D2494:249b-25: nang du gsang ba 'dus la sogs //
T02D2494:249b-26: phyi ru nyan thos spyod pa can //
T02D2494:249b-27: man ngag rim pa'i khyad par gyis //
T02D2494:249b-28: ji ltar rigs pa'i spyod pa la //
T02D2494:249b-29: slob ma rjes 'dzin ston pa dngos //
T02D2494:249b-30: de bzhin dkyil 'khor la sogs dang //
T02D2494:249b-31: mdo dang las kyi tshogs rnams dang //
T02D2494:249b-32: don dam pa yi bya ba mkhas //
T02D2494:249b-33: snang ba gsum la sogs pa la //
T02D2494:249b-34: rang gis goms 'gyur gzhan la ston //
T02D2494:249b-35: rnal 'byor rim pa'i slob dpon te //
T02D2494:249b-36: yid 'phrog sdud pa slob dpon no //
T02D2494:249b-37: de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes / dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las la mkhas //
T02D2494:249b-38: slob ma rjes 'dzin nus pa dang //
T02D2494:249b-39: gsang ba'i dbang gi mthar son pa //
T02D2494:249b-40: shes rab snying rje mtshungs par ldan //
T02D2494:249b-41: rgyud kyi rim pa'i sbyor ba mkhas //
T02D2494:249b-42: zab mo'i spyod pa rab ldan pa //
T02D2494:249b-43: 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' dngos //
T02D2494:249b-44: ji skad phyag na rdo rje yis //
T02D2494:249b-46: thun mong bsod nams bsag pa'i rgyu //
T02D2494:249b-47: ye shes dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2494:249b-48: dge bsnyen pha ma la sogs pa //
T02D2494:249b-49: slob dpon dag la rab tu phyogs //
T02D2494:249b-50: gsang sngags theg pa'i cho ga 'dir //
T02D2494:249b-51: slob dpon rnam pa gsum yin la //
T02D2494:250a-0: @250a * // khyim pa dge tshul dge slong ste //
T02D2494:250a-1: tha ma 'bring dang mchog yin no //
T02D2494:250a-2: sbyin bdag blo gros mi 'phel phyir //
T02D2494:250a-3: thun mong spang bya'i slob dpon ni //
T02D2494:250a-4: snying rje med cing khro ba dang //
T02D2494:250a-5: kheng shing chags la mi brtan pa //
T02D2494:250a-6: bslab pas ma bsdams 'dod pa che //
T02D2494:250a-7: rang la bstod pa mi bya'o //
T02D2494:250a-8: khyad par khyim pa'i slob dpon ni //
T02D2494:250a-9: bud med bcas shing dkor zas dang //
T02D2494:250a-10: zhing las g-yog dang tshong ba dang //
T02D2494:250a-11: rmongs pa rnyed phyir chos smra ba //
T02D2494:250a-12: 'di ni tshogs kyi slob dpon min //
T02D2494:250a-13: 'dir ni tshul khrims yon tan ldan //
T02D2494:250a-15: yon bdag zil gnon bkur ba'i gnas //
T02D2494:250a-17: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor gtso bo dag / ma byas yon bdag bsod nams nyams //
T02D2494:250a-19: dam tshig sdom pa ma gcig na //
T02D2494:250a-20: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug de yis ni //
T02D2494:250a-22: gzhan gyi rgyud kyi bslab byar mngon //
T02D2494:250a-23: gnas khang gzhan du mchod par bya'o //
T02D2494:250a-24: 'di nyid lung dang bcas pa'i phyir //
T02D2494:250a-25: bya ba don dang bcas par 'gyur //
T02D2494:250a-27: sgom rim gzhan du gyur pa na //
T02D2494:250a-28: rnal 'byor lhag pa'i lha la mchod //
T02D2494:250a-29: de yi rjes su rim pa 'dis //
T02D2494:250a-30: skad cig byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2494:250a-31: bsgrub bya de yi lha mchod pa //
T02D2494:250a-32: 'di nyid yang dag mtshan nyid yin //
T02D2494:250a-33: tha dad so so'i rgyud dag gis //
T02D2494:250a-34: bslab pas grol bar 'dod pa la //
T02D2494:250a-35: brda yi rim pa so so yi //
T02D2494:250a-36: phan tshun dam tshig sbyor mi shes //
T02D2494:250a-37: 'khor lo'i cho ga nyams pa nyid //
T02D2494:250a-38: de rnams mgron gyi rnam gzhag go / de nas lha yi nga rgyal gyis //
T02D2494:250a-39: gong du gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02D2494:250a-41: sngags kyis mchod la gsol ba gdab //
T02D2494:250a-42: rnal 'byor kun spyod la sogs pa'i //
T02D2494:250a-43: 'khor lo sngom pa'i rgyud kyis ni //
T02D2494:250a-44: nag po'i phyogs dang dkar phyogs kyi //
T02D2494:250a-45: bcu pa la ni de rab mchod //
T02D2494:250a-46: yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang //
T02D2494:250a-47: de bzhin du ni brgyad pa la //
T02D2494:250a-48: dpal ldan dgyes mdzad rdo rje mchod //
T02D2494:250a-50: gsang ba 'dus pa zla re bzhin //
T02D2494:250a-51: lnga brgyad bcu dang bcu bzhi dang //
T02D2494:250b-0: de bzhin bco lnga nag @250b phyogs la'ang /
T02D2494:250b-1: lnga ste dus ni bcu ru 'gyur //
T02D2494:250b-2: de dag dus kyi khyad par ro //
T02D2494:250b-3: 'dir ni rtag tu phun tshogs sam //
T02D2494:250b-4: ji ltar 'dod cing ji ltar nus //
T02D2494:250b-5: grub par nus na nyin re'am //
T02D2494:250b-6: lo zla kun du bya ba'o //
T02D2494:250b-7: gnas ni dben par gsang ba yi //
T02D2494:250b-8: 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya //
T02D2494:250b-9: phyag rgya chen po thig le las //
T02D2494:250b-10: thams cad 'jigs pa spangs pa yi //
T02D2494:250b-11: skye bos dben zhing yid 'phrog pa //
T02D2494:250b-12: grong ngam ldum ra nags tshal dang //
T02D2494:250b-13: dur khrod ri yi phug tu'o //
T02D2494:250b-14: dang po yid 'jug byi dor bya //
T02D2494:250b-15: dkyil 'khor rnam par me tog dgram //
T02D2494:250b-16: rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las ni //
T02D2494:250b-17: me tog sna tshogs bkram pa yi //
T02D2494:250b-18: gzhal yas khang gis rnam par spras //
T02D2494:250b-19: de dag gnas kyi rnam bzhag go //
T02D2494:250b-20: gang zhig dam tshig med par ni //
T02D2494:250b-21: bu la sogs pa'ang mi gzhug go //
T02D2494:250b-22: ji skad sngom pa 'byung ba las //
T02D2494:250b-23: yongs su grub pa'i gnas dag dang //
T02D2494:250b-24: gdan la 'jug par bya ba ni ;
T02D2494:250b-25: / rgan dang gzhon pa'i dbye bas der //
T02D2494:250b-26: slob dpon rjes su 'jug par bya //
T02D2494:250b-27: snod dang mi ldan rgyal che //
T02D2494:250b-28: bla ma'i skyon rtog shes rgyud rtsub //
T02D2494:250b-29: gong ma'i dbang gis ma smin pa //
T02D2494:250b-30: rang gi bu dang chung ma dang //
T02D2494:250b-31: de bzhin bram dang bran mor bcas //
T02D2494:250b-32: dngos grub 'dod phyir sgrub pa pos //
T02D2494:250b-33: dam tshig 'di dag gzhug mi bya //
T02D2494:250b-34: de ltar 'di dag gzhug pa na //
T02D2494:250b-35: rmongs dang dngos grub ring bar 'gyur //
T02D2494:250b-36: dam tshig bral gyur sdug bsngal zhing //
T02D2494:250b-37: de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis myong //
T02D2494:250b-38: gnas nas 'thon dang phung tshogs nyams //
T02D2494:250b-39: sna tshogs sdug bsngal myong ba nyid//
T02D2494:250b-40: sgrub pos 'di bzhin mchod pa'i yul //
T02D2494:250b-41: pha rol rnal 'byor dngos grub nyams //
T02D2494:250b-42: dam tshig med pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D2494:250b-43: nam yang bskor bar mi bya'o //
T02D2494:250b-44: mched yul rnam par bzhag pa ni //
T02D2494:250b-45: tshul dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2494:250b-46: snyan gsan pha ba pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2494:250b-47: slob dpon rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2494:250b-48: phyi ru rnal 'byor khrus byas nas //
T02D2494:250b-49: sgo dag skyong ba'i slob dpon la //
T02D2494:250b-51: khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste //
T02D2494:250b-52: khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong //
T02D2494:250b-53: nor bu rin chen spras pa yi //
T02D2494:250b-54: dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa nyid //
T02D2494:251a-2: rnal 'byor tshogs kyi dbus dag tu //
T02D2494:251a-3: bzang po'i sgo ni phye nas su //
T02D2494:251a-4: dpa' bos gnang gis gtong du gsol //
T02D2494:251a-5: nang du stan la rgan rim gyis //
T02D2494:251a-7: yang na gral gyi rim pa'o //
T02D2494:251a-8: de nas slob dpon yon bdag gis //
T02D2494:251a-9: ri rab steng du skad cig la //
T02D2494:251a-10: gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang dkyil du //
T02D2494:251a-11: lhag pa'i lha yi gzugs su blta //
T02D2494:251a-12: dam tshig sems dpa'i rang bzhin la //
T02D2494:251a-13: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya //
T02D2494:251a-14: aargha dang ni zhal bsil dang //
T02D2494:251a-15: bsad chu sngon du 'gro ba yis //
T02D2494:251a-16: me tog phreng ba spos la sogs //
T02D2494:251a-17: thun mong gi ni mchod pa dbul //
T02D2494:251a-18: yon gyi bdag pos bstod pa bya //
T02D2494:251a-19: dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni //
T02D2494:251a-21: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid //
T02D2494:251a-23: ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D2494:251a-24: kun du rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing //
T02D2494:251a-26: de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2494:251a-27: yod med rtog pa las grol zhing //
T02D2494:251a-29: dpe med bde bas gang gyur pa'i //
T02D2494:251a-30: 'khor lo'i dpa' bo la sogs bstod //
T02D2494:251a-32: slob dpon rgyud kyi dbye bas der //
T02D2494:251a-33: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas ni //
T02D2494:251a-34: rang gi lha yi gzugs su 'gyur //
T02D2494:251a-35: ji lha'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom //
T02D2494:251a-36: yon bdag yi dam gzhan yin na //
T02D2494:251a-37: sngon la rang gi yi dam ste //
T02D2494:251a-38: rjes la skad cig nyid la ni //
T02D2494:251a-40: rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D2494:251a-41: las kyi rdo rje'i bya ba ni //
T02D2494:251a-42: ji skad bde mchog 'byung ba las //
T02D2494:251a-43: gtsang zhing zhi la blo gros ldan //
T02D2494:251a-44: rmongs dang ser sna rnam par spang //
T02D2494:251a-45: thams cad dang ni mthun par blta //
T02D2494:251a-46: las kyi rdo rjer der rtog go //
T02D2494:251a-47: de bzhin rdo rje phreng ba las //
T02D2494:251a-48: khyod ni rang byung rdo rje sems //
T02D2494:251a-49: mtshungs med las kyi rdo rje nyid //
T02D2494:251a-50: de nas sna tshogs ston mo dang //
T02D2494:251a-51: sha dang chang ni mnyam por sbyor //
T02D2494:251a-52: longs spyod yid 'phrog bde ba can //
T02D2494:251a-53: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes //
T02D2494:251a-54: aa mra dang ni pa nas //
T02D2494:251b-0: mi dim na r'i ke la @251b sogs //
T02D2494:251b-1: 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D2494:251b-2: tshogs kyi dkyil du dbul ba ni //
T02D2494:251b-3: yang dag sbyor ba'i rgyud las gsungs //
T02D2494:251b-4: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs //
T02D2494:251b-5: ji ltar tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02D2494:251b-6: bdud rtsi ri lu'i chu yis bsang //
T02D2494:251b-7: sngon du gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T02D2494:251b-8: phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las //
T02D2494:251b-9: thog mar gtor ma chen po ni //
T02D2494:251b-10: sna tshogs pa yi bza' ba dang //
T02D2494:251b-11: btung ba dang ni ldan pa nyid //
T02D2494:251b-12: thog ma bar dang tha ma ni //
T02D2494:251b-13: lhag pa lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2494:251b-14: gtor ma dbul bar bya ba ni //
T02D2494:251b-15: mdun du dri bzang sogs pas byug / dri yis thig les dkyil 'khor la ;
T02D2494:251b-16: / rang gi lha yi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2494:251b-17: cho ga bzhin du bskyed la mchod //
T02D2494:251b-18: dam tshig sems dpa' mkha' nyid las //
T02D2494:251b-19: ye shes sems dpa' dgug par bya //
T02D2494:251b-20: de yi rtsibs bcur khro bo bcu //
T02D2494:251b-21: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la //
T02D2494:251b-22: sgrub pa po yi lha nyid de //
T02D2494:251b-23: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol du ;
T02D2494:251b-24: /'khor dang bcas pa'i phyogs skyong dang //
T02D2494:251b-25: zhing skyong dur khrod la sogs pa //
T02D2494:251b-26: ji ltar mngon rtogs sngags kyis ni //
T02D2494:251b-27: skad cig gis ni rang gi lha //
T02D2494:251b-29: yum dang bcas pa nyid du bsgom //
T02D2494:251b-30: dam tshig la ni gzhug par bya //
T02D2494:251b-31: ji ltar cho ga la sogs pa //
T02D2494:251b-32: gtor ma bdud rtsir byin brlabs te //
T02D2494:251b-33: rang rang sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02D2494:251b-34: khyad par so so'i mngon rtogs ni //
T02D2494:251b-35: gzhung mngas 'jigs pas ma bris shing //
T02D2494:251b-36: yongs su grags pa cung zad bkod //
T02D2494:251b-37: de nas g-yon pa'i ming med dang //
T02D2494:251b-38: rgan po'i sor mo gnyis sbyar nas //
T02D2494:251b-39: shes rab khu ba byin gyis brlab //
T02D2494:251b-40: de yi mdun du chos 'byung bri //
T02D2494:251b-41: shes rab thabs kyi khu bas gtor //
T02D2494:251b-42: lhag pa lha yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2494:251b-43: gzugs brnyan bzhin du gsal bar blta //
T02D2494:251b-44: srung bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas //
T02D2494:251b-45: ting 'dzin byed pa rgyun mi bcad //
T02D2494:251b-46: de nas las kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D2494:251b-47: slob dpon la ni snod gnyis dbul //
T02D2494:251b-48: gzhan pa rnams la re re'o //
T02D2494:251b-49: mchod rdzas bla ma nyis 'gyur ro //
T02D2494:251b-50: de nas gzhan rnams mnyam por shes //
T02D2494:251b-51: 'ga' zhig tshim par ma gyur na'ang //
T02D2494:251b-52: rang gis blang bar mi bya ste //
T02D2494:252a-2: ltung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2494:252a-3: gang zhig lag nas lhung ba drag / dngos po gzhan gyis dgab par bya //
T02D2494:252a-4: 'dren pas ha cang gang ba min //
T02D2494:252a-5: len pas ha cang stong pa min //
T02D2494:252a-6: phan tshun gcig la gcig min bzhin//
T02D2494:252a-7: 'dod ces ngag gis smra ba min //
T02D2494:252a-8: 'dren pas pad kor phyag rgya ste /
T02D2494:252a-9: g-yon pas steng du bskyod par bya //
T02D2494:252a-10: len pas kyang ni de bzhin no //
T02D2494:252a-11: phyag 'tshal nas ni dbul bya zhing //
T02D2494:252a-12: 'dren pas de bzhin shes par bya //
T02D2494:252a-13: g-yas pa'i lha nga sar btsugs te //
T02D2494:252a-14: thog mar thabs dang shes rab la //
T02D2494:252a-15: gzigs shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos //
T02D2494:252a-16: 'di la the tshom bya mi rung //
T02D2494:252a-17: bram ze khyi dang gdol pa yang //
T02D2494:252a-18: rang bzhin gcig tu dgongs te rol //
T02D2494:252a-19: tshigs bcad 'dis ni sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2494:252a-20: yang ni len pa po yis ni //
T02D2494:252a-21: bde gshegs chos la rin thang med //
T02D2494:252a-22: 'dod chags la sogs dri ma bral //
T02D2494:252a-23: gzung 'dzin rnam par spangs pa yis //
T02D2494:252a-24: de kho na nyid la skyabs mchi'o //
T02D2494:252a-25: tshigs bcad 'dis ni len par bya'o //
T02D2494:252a-26: bla ma'i bka' drin gnang ba yi //
T02D2494:252a-27: snod ni sa la gzhag mi bya //
T02D2494:252a-28: gnang ba thob gyur gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2494:252a-29: de las gzhan du chad par 'gyur //
T02D2494:252a-30: slob dpon rjes gnang ma byin par //
T02D2494:252a-31: rnal 'byor bza' btung don gzhan min //
T02D2494:252a-32: slob dpon thog mar rang gi ni //
T02D2494:252a-33: phyag rgya mchod la de nas rol //
T02D2494:252a-34: btung ba dga' ba bskyed pa tsam //
T02D2494:252a-35: de bas lhag dang chad pa min //
T02D2494:252a-36: bde ba bskyed phyir btung ba ste //
T02D2494:252a-37: myos pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T02D2494:252a-38: rnal 'byor lha yi nga rgyal dang //
T02D2494:252a-39: dus rnams kun du bya ba nyid //
T02D2494:252a-40: rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las ni //
T02D2494:252a-42: gtam gyi rnyed pa la sogs pa //
T02D2494:252a-43: de bzhin g-yeng ba spang bar bya //
T02D2494:252a-44: mchil ma 'dor la sogs pa dang //
T02D2494:252a-45: smang ra 'thog dang dgod pa dang //
T02D2494:252a-46: rkang lag brkyang bar mi bya'o //
T02D2494:252a-47: yang yang ldang dang 'dug pa dang //
T02D2494:252a-48: mgrin pa bsgyur sogs rtag tu spang //
T02D2494:252a-49: gang zhig dgos pa'i dbye ba la //
T02D2494:252a-50: brda skad phyag rgya bgo bar bya //
T02D2494:252a-52: gnang ba byin par ma gyur par //
T02D2494:252b-0: gzhan du glu dang @252b gar dang ni //
T02D2494:252b-1: de bzhin rol mo 'khrol la sogs //
T02D2494:252b-2: zab mo'i skad sogs 'dri ba min //
T02D2494:252b-3: gnang ba thob nas ci bder 'gyur //
T02D2494:252b-4: gang zhig bza' dang btang ba la //
T02D2494:252b-5: thams cad bdud rtsir sbyar byas la //
T02D2494:252b-6: de nas rang gi lte bar ni //
T02D2494:252b-7: gang zhig dgos pa'i dbye ba yis //
T02D2494:252b-8: lha yi 'khor lo gnas par bsam //
T02D2494:252b-9: rang gi lag pa g-yas dang g-yon //
T02D2494:252b-10: blugs gzar dgang gzar rang gzugs nyid //
T02D2494:252b-11: lte ba'i lha la mchod pa'i tshul //
T02D2494:252b-12: longs spyod tshogs kyis mchod par bya //
T02D2494:252b-13: de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa'i yul //
T02D2494:252b-14: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po nyid //
T02D2494:252b-15: ji ltar lha yi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D2494:252b-16: rnam par dag pa'i ro gcig pa'i //
T02D2494:252b-17: phan tshun shes pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2494:252b-18: de yang rdo rje phreng ba las //
T02D2494:252b-19: lte ba padma'i dbus su ni //
T02D2494:252b-20: dpa' bo dbang phyug dran pa nyid //
T02D2494:252b-21: gang zhig phan tshun gcig la gcig / rnam par dag par mi shes na //
T02D2494:252b-24: gang du rim pa 'di yis ni //
T02D2494:252b-25: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kun //
T02D2494:252b-26: ro gcig par ni spyad byas nas //
T02D2494:252b-29: myos byed bde ba bskyed pa'i tshe //
T02D2494:252b-30: glu dang gar ni byed 'dod na //
T02D2494:252b-31: gnang ba thob nas rdo rje yi //
T02D2494:252b-32: glu gar rnal 'byor pa yis bya //
T02D2494:252b-33: de yang brtag gnyis rgyal po las //
T02D2494:252b-34: glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas //
T02D2494:252b-35: gar ni sdom pa byed pa nyid //
T02D2494:252b-36: de yi phyir ni glu dang gar //
T02D2494:252b-37: rnal 'byor pa yis rgyun du bya //
T02D2494:252b-38: dga' ba rdo rje bsdams pa yis //
T02D2494:252b-39: rkang ba rdo rje rtse gcig dang //
T02D2494:252b-40: rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag pa yis //
T02D2494:252b-41: bde ba bskyed phyir gar nyid de //
T02D2494:252b-42: thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya'o //
T02D2494:252b-43: rgyud las gsungs pa'i rim pa ste //
T02D2494:252b-44: gzhan du gnang ba ma yin no //
T02D2494:252b-45: de bzhin rdo rje phreng ba las//
T02D2494:252b-46: dga' ba bskyed nas gnang ba yis //
T02D2494:252b-47: glu dang gar ni bya ba nyid //
T02D2494:252b-48: gang zhig rdo rje bsdams la sogs //
T02D2494:252b-49: de bzhin lha ni mnyes pa nyid //
T02D2494:252b-50: rgyud las gsungs pa rdo rje'i glu //
T02D2494:252b-51: kolla ai retthi a'a bo l'a /
T02D2494:252b-52: mummu ni re ka kako l'a /
T02D2494:252b-53: gha ne kri pi ta ho b'adzra ai /
T02D2494:253a-0: ka ru ne ki aa ai @253a * //
T02D2494:253a-2: ta him ba la kh'a dzdza ai /
T02D2494:253a-3: g'a dhem ma aa n'a pidzdza aa ai /
T02D2494:253a-4: ha le kva ye k'a linydza ra pa ni aa ai /
T02D2494:253a-6: tsa au sa ma katstshu r'i si hla /
T02D2494:253a-7: kapdu ra l'a ai aa ai /
T02D2494:253a-8: m'a la aa ndha na s'a linydza /
T02D2494:253a-9: ta him bha ru kh'a ai aa ai /
T02D2494:253a-10: phrem kha na kha ta ka rente /
T02D2494:253a-11: shu ddha aa shuddha na mu ni aa ai /
T02D2494:253a-12: ni ram su aam ge tstsha d'a wi /
T02D2494:253a-13: ta him dza sa r'a wa pa ni aa ai /
T02D2494:253a-14: ma la aa dze kundu ru p'a ta ai dendi ma ta him na b'idzdza aa ae /
T02D2494:253a-15: grub thob bla mas gsungs pa'i dbyangs //
T02D2494:253a-16: stong pa snying rje dbyer med par //
T02D2494:253a-17: don ston rdo rje'i glu nyid do //
T02D2494:253a-18: gzhan du rtogs pas phan tshun du ;
T02D2494:253a-19: / sbrel ba rdo rje'i glu ma yin //
T02D2494:253a-20: rdo rje rkang pa'i gar la sogs //
T02D2494:253a-21: gzhan du grags phyir 'dir ma spros //
T02D2494:253a-22: 'dir ni cho ga ji bzhin du //
T02D2494:253a-23: glu gar la sogs rim pa ni //
T02D2494:253a-24: byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba nyid //
T02D2494:253a-25: de la thun mong byin rlabs rtags //
T02D2494:253a-26: de yang brtag gnyis rgyal po las //
T02D2494:253a-27: gsungs pa rim bzhin shes byas te //
T02D2494:253a-28: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug mdun du ni //
T02D2494:253a-29: gang zhig gus pas glu dang gar //
T02D2494:253a-30: byas pas dri yi mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2494:253a-31: thog mar sgog pa'i dri nyid de //
T02D2494:253a-32: de nas yang ni bya rgod dri //
T02D2494:253a-33: ga pur ma la ya yi dri //
T02D2494:253a-34: byin rlabs glu yi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2494:253a-35: dang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra //
T02D2494:253a-36: thos pas glu yi khyad par nyid //
T02D2494:253a-37: ba lang tshe yi sgra nyid ni //
T02D2494:253a-38: phyi rol nye pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2494:253a-39: khyad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags //
T02D2494:253a-40: de yang rdo rje phreng ba las //
T02D2494:253a-41: gal te thun mong rnal 'byor ma //
T02D2494:253a-43: g-yon pa'i tstsho ma'i brda yis ni //
T02D2494:253a-44: bde ba'i phyag rgya bya ba nyid //
T02D2494:253a-45: de la sgrub pa po yis ni //
T02D2494:253a-46: gtam 'dri rnam rtog byar mi rung //
T02D2494:253a-47: cung zad dri bar 'dod na yang //
T02D2494:253a-48: gang zhig rdo rje slob dpon nam //
T02D2494:253a-49: yang na las kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D2494:253a-51: sna tshogs gzugs kyi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D2494:253a-53: de la the tshom za ba dang //
T02D2494:253a-54: ya mtshan 'jigs par byed don sogs //
T02D2494:253a-55: sgrub pa po yis mi bya ste //
T02D2494:253a-56: byas na dngos grub nyams pa nyid //
T02D2494:253a-57: de nas dkyil 'khor sdud pa na //
T02D2494:253a-58: lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T02D2494:253a-59: de yang rdo rje phreng ba las //
T02D2494:253b-0: lhag ma'i @253b gtor ma'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2494:253b-2: aom kshi autstshi nde kshe tra p'a l'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D2494:253b-3: sngags 'di brjod cing kha phrus gdab //
T02D2494:253b-4: yang na slob dpon sngon 'gro bas //
T02D2494:253b-5: gang zhig ma mthong gyur pa na //
T02D2494:253b-6: rtags kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2494:253b-7: rnal 'byor gyis ni shes par bya //
T02D2494:253b-8: gang zhig byad zlum kha dog dmar //
T02D2494:253b-9: bzhin bzang smin ma ring ba ni //
T02D2494:253b-10: 'od dpag med kyi rigs shes bya //
T02D2494:253b-11: de la rus sbal phyag rgya bstan //
T02D2494:253b-12: cung zad sbom zhing mig dkyus ring //
T02D2494:253b-13: dkar ser mdog can yid 'phrog ma //
T02D2494:253b-14: sna tshogs gos ni 'dzin pa ste //
T02D2494:253b-15: ri mo gsum 'greng dpral bar mtshan //
T02D2494:253b-16: gang du gnas pa'i sa dag tu //
T02D2494:253b-17: grong pa'i shi sogs gtam smra ba //
T02D2494:253b-19: dpal ldan mkha' 'gro zhes byar blta //
T02D2494:253b-20: rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgya bstan //
T02D2494:253b-21: g-yon brkyang ba yi gar stabs kyis //
T02D2494:253b-22: de yi mdun du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2494:253b-23: lag tu g-yon pas byin nas ni //
T02D2494:253b-24: phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed //
T02D2494:253b-25: kha dog gnag cing gos nag 'dzin //
T02D2494:253b-26: skra li dpral ba gzhu yi dbyibs //
T02D2494:253b-27: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog par ston //
T02D2494:253b-28: sems 'gro ba yi mar rab grags //
T02D2494:253b-29: g-yon bskum dge ba'i gar gyis ni //
T02D2494:253b-30: phyag rgya rab tu bstan par bya //
T02D2494:253b-31: mi bskyod pa yi rigs su shes //
T02D2494:253b-32: g-yon pa'i stangs kyi lan yang 'debs //
T02D2494:253b-33: lus sbom gsus pa cung zad 'phyang //
T02D2494:253b-34: mig yangs rdzi ma mang ba la //
T02D2494:253b-35: byin pa sbom zhing mdzes pa ni //
T02D2494:253b-36: sa 'og grub pa shes pa ste //
T02D2494:253b-37: rnam snang rigs su shes pas na //
T02D2494:253b-38: de la dung gi phyag rgya bstan //
T02D2494:253b-39: mig skam ba spu thams cad langs //
T02D2494:253b-40: lus skem lag pa ring ba la //
T02D2494:253b-41: mkha' 'gro zhes sgra rab tu sgrogs //
T02D2494:253b-42: 'di nyid don grub rigs su shes //
T02D2494:253b-43: de la rab blta mtha' ma bskor //
T02D2494:253b-44: lag pa g-yon gyi dbye ba yi //
T02D2494:253b-45: ba dan phyag rgya bstan par bya //
T02D2494:253b-46: ji ltar 'di dag la mkhas pas //
T02D2494:253b-47: rab tu 'bad bas shes par bya //
T02D2494:253b-48: dri ba'am phyag rgya byed pa na //
T02D2494:253b-49: de yi don gyis mchod par brjod //
T02D2494:253b-50: gang zhig 'di rnams thams cad la //
T02D2494:253b-51: dpa' bo rkyang pa'i bya ba ni //
T02D2494:254a-2: tshogs kyi dbang phyug de lta min //
T02D2494:254a-3: de bzhin dpa' mo rkyang pa la //
T02D2494:254a-4: dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ston mo nyid //
T02D2494:254a-5: de ltar 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la //
T02D2494:254a-6: shes rab thabs dang bcas pa nyid //
T02D2494:254a-7: gzhan yang gang zhig stobs dang ni //
T02D2494:254a-8: myos byed khu ba rkyang pa ni ;
T02D2494:254a-9: /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs //
T02D2494:254a-10: stobs dang myos byed khu bar ni //
T02D2494:254a-11: mi ldan yon tan bsod nams nyams //
T02D2494:254a-12: gtso bo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gis //
T02D2494:254a-13: khyad par shes rab g-yon du bzhag /'dir ni ji ltar 'byor pa dang //
T02D2494:254a-14: ji ltar nus pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D2494:254a-15: lnga yi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor sogs //
T02D2494:254a-16: rnam par dag pa'i chogs mchod //
T02D2494:254a-17: thams cad rang gi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2494:254a-19: rnam dag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2494:254a-20: slob mas tshogs kyi rnal 'byor goms //
T02D2494:254a-21: nang gi dbang phyug gyur pa ste //
T02D2494:254a-22: rgyun par shin tu goms pas na //
T02D2494:254a-23: gang tshe cho ga 'di yis ni //
T02D2494:254a-24: rim pa 'di ni rnam par spyad //
T02D2494:254a-25: de tshe rtag tu goms pas na //
T02D2494:254a-26: spros bcas spros med rnam par gzhag / de nas sgrub pa po yis ni //
T02D2494:254a-27: zhal bsil phyag phyis go la dbul //
T02D2494:254a-28: yon tan sogs pas mnyes par bya //
T02D2494:254a-29: rang gi lha yi 'khor lo nyid //
T02D2494:254a-30: dang po thar par 'gyur ba ste //
T02D2494:254a-31: de nas bsod nams bsngo bar bya //
T02D2494:254a-32: bzod par gsol la tshogs kyi ni //
T02D2494:254a-33: 'khor lo gshegs par bya ba nyid //
T02D2494:254a-34: bdag nyid dbang phyug gyur pas na //
T02D2494:254a-35: gzhan la phyag ni bya mi dgos //
T02D2494:254a-36: cho ga'i rim pa 'di yis ni //
T02D2494:254a-37: ji ltar rigs par 'bad gyur na //
T02D2494:254a-38: de yi bsod nams mtha' ma ni //
T02D2494:254a-39: tshad gzung nus pa ma yin no //
T02D2494:254a-40: de ltar phyag na rdo rje yis //
T02D2494:254a-42: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu
T02D2494:254a-43: zhes bya ba pandi ta ratna rakshi tas mdzad pa
T02D2494:254a-45: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta ratna rakshi ta
T02D2494:254a-46: pa'i zhal snga nas bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i
